name: imap
description: IMAP email integration for fetching messages from email servers

host.label: IMAP Server
host.help_text: The hostname of your IMAP server (e.g., imap.gmail.com)

port.label: Port
port.help_text: The port number for the IMAP server

password.label: Password
password.help_text: Your email password or app password

use_ssl.label: Security
use_ssl.help_text: The security mode to use for the connection

folder.label: Source Folder
folder.help_text: The IMAP folder to monitor for new messages (default: INBOX)

processed_action.label: After Processing
processed_action.help_text: What to do with messages after they are processed

processed_folder.label: Processed Folder
processed_folder.help_text: Folder to move processed messages to (e.g., INBOX/Processed)

fetch_interval.label: Fetch Interval
fetch_interval.help_text: How often to check for new messages (in seconds)
